proposal1.heroHeadline: Shida is losing 500 hours a year on manual proposals. Here's how to reclaim them.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Currently, crafting proposals takes hours away from design innovation. Automate it in 47 seconds with our system.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Shida's current proposal process is draining valuable time and resources.

problems.title: Time Drain
problems.description: Shida spends over 10 hours a week crafting proposals. That‚Äôs 520 hours annually, time that could be spent on client projects.

problems.title: Lost Revenue
problems.description: Each hour writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This results in estimated losses of $20,000 annually.

problems.title: Inconsistent Branding
problems.description: Manually created proposals can lead to branding inconsistencies. This misalignment can erode client trust and cost potential contracts.

problems.title: Delayed Responses
problems.description: Proposals take days to complete. This delay can cause client interest to wane, leading to lost opportunities.

problems.title: Resource Strain
problems.description: With only 4 team members, proposal writing diverts critical resources away from design tasks, impacting project delivery.

problems.title: Competitive Disadvantage
problems.description: Slow proposal turnaround limits Shida's ability to compete. Faster competitors secure projects first, costing Shida potential clients.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system transforms the proposal process, eliminating all the above inefficiencies.

solutions.title: Instant Proposals
solutions.description: Currently, proposals take hours or days. With our system, they are ready in under 60 seconds.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Manual processes risk inconsistency. Our AI ensures every proposal aligns with Shida‚Äôs brand identity.

solutions.title: Real-Time Customization
solutions.description: Customizing proposals manually is tedious. Our system tailors proposals to each client instantly.

solutions.title: Enhanced Tracking
solutions.description: Currently, tracking proposal engagement is manual and incomplete. Our system provides real-time tracking and insights.

solutions.title: AI Chatbot Assistance
solutions.description: Responding to queries is time-consuming. Our AI chatbot handles questions instantly, keeping prospects engaged.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Shida's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Shida around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Shida.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Elevate Acme Corp's Brand with Shida's Expert Design Solutions
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Our approach will refine your brand identity and improve customer engagement through targeted design strategies.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Acme Corp is currently experiencing significant losses due to inefficiencies and missed opportunities.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rates
problems.description: With a conversion rate of only 2%, every visitor who leaves your site without converting is revenue walking out the door. This translates to thousands in lost sales monthly.

problems.title: Customer Retention Issues
problems.description: Current retention rates are below industry average, leading to a loss of recurring revenue. For every 10 customers, 4 do not return.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistency
problems.description: Inconsistent branding results in customer confusion and diluted brand messaging. This impacts your ability to command premium pricing.

problems.title: Ineffective Marketing Collateral
problems.description: Marketing materials are outdated, resulting in a 30% drop in engagement rates compared to competitors. This leads to missed sales opportunities.

problems.title: Poor User Experience
problems.description: A complicated user interface causes frustration and a high bounce rate of 60%, leading to potential customers abandoning the site.

problems.title: Competitive Disadvantage
problems.description: Without a strong visual identity, your brand loses out to competitors, reducing market share by an estimated 10% annually.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Our strategic design solutions directly address these challenges to reclaim lost revenue and strengthen your market position.

solutions.title: Brand Identity Development
solutions.description: We will create a cohesive brand identity that resonates with your target audience, enhancing recognition and trust.

solutions.title: Conversion Optimization
solutions.description: By analyzing user behavior, we will redesign the site to improve conversion rates and reduce bounce rates.

solutions.title: Marketing Collateral Redesign
solutions.description: We will update your marketing materials to increase engagement and improve communication with potential customers.

solutions.title: Web Design and Development
solutions.description: Our team will enhance your website's design for a seamless user experience, fostering increased customer retention.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: Shida offers unparalleled expertise in graphic design, ensuring your brand stands out.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Track Record
whyUsCards.description: We have helped numerous clients achieve their branding goals, resulting in measurable success.

whyUsCards.title: Comprehensive Services
whyUsCards.description: From brand identity to web development, we offer a full range of design services tailored to your needs.

whyUsCards.title: Client-Centric Approach
whyUsCards.description: We prioritize your business objectives, ensuring our solutions align with your vision.

whyUsCards.title: Result-Oriented Strategies
whyUsCards.description: Our strategies are designed to deliver tangible results, improving your bottom line.

proposal2.teamIntro: Our team is dedicated to delivering exceptional results for Acme Corp.

team.name: Kenji Doshida
team.bio: Kenji leads our strategy and client relationships, ensuring every project aligns with client goals and delivers measurable success.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Research
process.description: We dive deep into understanding your business and audience.

process.title: Strategy Development
process.description: We craft a tailored strategy to address your unique challenges.

process.title: Design & Implementation
process.description: We bring the strategy to life with compelling design solutions.

process.title: Review & Optimization
process.description: We assess the impact and make necessary adjustments for optimal results.

pricing.description: Basic design package for small-scale improvements.

pricing.description: Comprehensive design solutions for medium-sized businesses.

proposal2.ctaDescription: Let's discuss how our design solutions can elevate your business. Schedule a call to explore your options.
proposal2.footerSub: Innovative Design Solutions for Your Business

Our team of professionals will keep you informed and involved throughout the entire process. Consider us an extension of your own 'in-house' design department.
